title: GOL-Fit Next Level Athletic Supporter – Naturally Contoured Waistband for Comfort - Multiple Colors
features: Soft, breathable knit pouch provides additional comfort and support
1” Gol-fit leg bands resist twisting and binding
3” contoured waistband provides comfort and durability
description: Engineered using Gol-Fit next level technology - the Golberg men's performance athletic supporter is specifically designed to enhance mobility and provide necessary support with comfort and breathability. Golberg men's performance athletic supporters' unique and innovative design is created with premium high-quality material to ensure product durability.
Premium pouch allows for superior comfort, breathability and airflow - 96% Poly / 4% Spandex
Premium pouch allows for superior comfort, breathability and airflow - 96% Poly / 4% Spandex
3" Wide waistband is soft and non-irritating, allowing for stretch and movement while maintaining shape through repeated washes - 88% Poly / 12% Natural Latex
3" Wide waistband is soft and non-irritating, allowing for stretch and movement while maintaining shape through repeated washes - 88% Poly / 12% Natural Latex
Leg straps resist twisting and binding, providing comfort and durability for extended use - 88% Poly / 12% Natural Latex
Leg straps resist twisting and binding, providing comfort and durability for extended use - 88% Poly / 12% Natural Latex
Golberg men's athletic supporters are offered in an assortment of colors and sizes:
Black, White, Red, Blue and Green
Golberg strives for premium fit. Each size has 1 inch of give for stretch/flexibility in movement and fit.
